questions.question: What is the p-value in a hypothesis test?

answers.a: The probability of rejecting the null hypothesis when it is true
answers.b: The probability of failing to reject the null hypothesis when it is false
answers.c: The probability of observing the sample data or something more extreme, assuming the null hypothesis is true
answers.d: The probability of the alternative hypothesis being true
